[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@cerbos/embedded](./embedded.md)

## embedded package

Client library for interacting with embedded Cerbos policy decision points generated by [Cerbos Hub](https://hub.cerbos.cloud) from server-side Node.js and browser-based applications.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Embedded](./embedded.embedded.md) | A client for interacting with an embedded Cerbos policy decision point generated by [Cerbos Hub](https://hub.cerbos.cloud)<!-- -->. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Options](./embedded.options.md) | Options for creating a new [Embedded](./embedded.embedded.md) client. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [DecodedJWTPayload](./embedded.decodedjwtpayload.md) | The decoded payload of a JWT, containing the claims. |
|  [DecodeJWTPayload](./embedded.decodejwtpayload.md) | A function to verify and decode a JWT, returning its payload. |
|  [Source](./embedded.source.md) | WebAssembly binary code of an embedded policy decision point bundle (or an HTTP response from which to stream it). |
